about_the_game:
Overview


Stickfigurez is an indie platform fighter featuring iconic characters from classic stick figure animations. The goal of this game is to give players complete control over their movements and decisions, all while staying true to the medium we're inspired by. we want you to feel like you're creating an animation while playing!

Announced Characters



a weapon specialist capable of warping and freezing time, chronos outpaces opponents with short-ranged blades and quickdraw pistols. the ability to weave in and out of combat with movement speed, momentum-altering weapons, and time warping makes chronos one of the scariest duelists to face.


an aging, battle hardened champion of the scene, "alfa" utilizes a specially constructed katana with a jet engine built into the hilt, allowing him to propel himself in any direction during combat. he specializes in offensive precision and positioning, and despite his age, is still considered an elite swordsman incapable of passing his prime.


a younger fighter who modified his favorite childhood toy into a uniquely powerful weapon, capable of storing energy as it spins and releasing massive shockwaves upon impact. yoyo aims to keep his opponents at specific distances to maximize the effectiveness of this tool, or use it to help with traversal and recovery.


a mysterious spellcaster who seems to have altered the way gravity effects his body. equipped with a giant staff capable of casting hexes, tricks , or conjuring creatures from alternate dimensions, micwizard fights in a style all his own.

Game Features


-8 playable characters (the remaining 4 will be announced soon).
-online multiplayer featuring smooth rollback netcode.
-private lobbies with friends and random matchmaking.
-competitive and casual stages / rulesets.
-robust training mode to learn your favorite characters.
-consistent updates with new characters, stages, and game modes.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11.5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Stickfigurez

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 512MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: STICKFIGUREZ is an indie platform fighter featuring iconic characters from classic stick figure animations. Play with up to 4 players locally or online!
